value:
I wasn't sure when you yanked me
to this place, but I like it here.
It's pretty, and everyone is so nice!

I was alone for a long, long time...
But after I joined Chrom's army,
I have lots of really fun friends!

Good job! I've been watching you
work, and you've earned a reward.
Bend down so I can pat your head.

Wanna play hide-and-dragonseek?
I'll be the dragon, and you can be
the person I chase after!

I was just looking for shiny rocks!
If you find one, let me know so
I can put it in my pouch.

Hi! One of your friends asked me
to come and say that to you. It
was $Nf!$k$pNow I'm supposed to go straight
home.

I feel like I could take on a whole
army!
Yes! Now we're talking!
Aw, I can do better than this...

Neat power! Does it make me
look taller?

I'm Nowi, a Manakete. That means
I'm a dragon! I'm also over 1,000
years old, so I'll be your big sister!

Found you, $Nu!
Let's play together! How about
some hide-and-dragonseek? Tag?$k$pHuh? You just want to chat? I like
to run around a bunch, but if that's
what you want, we can do that!$k$pI love playing with you—you're nice
and you're fun and I feel safe with
you. Hm? Aww! How sweet!$k$pWell, if that's how we both feel,
let's stick together forever and
ever!$k$pSince I'm older, I'll be sure to
always keep you safe,
$Nu! It's a promise!
えーい！
てりゃっ！
ふぎゅっ！
RAGE!
Who do you think I am?!
I'm gonna crush you!
A-aa—aCHOO!
Dragon rampage!
Awww...
Eheehee
Hey, let's play a game!
Don't worry—the big, tough dragon's got your back.
Maybe in another thousand years I'll be able to reach the top shelf.
Dragon breath! Rawr!
I may not look it, but I'm actually older than you. Heehee!
I wonder where the best sparklies for my collection might be...
Alfonse and Sharena and Anna are the best! You're the best, too!
Yeah!
My turn?
Let's go!
